titleStmt.title: This is a true copy of the ordynau[n]ce made in the tyme of the reygne of Kynge Henry the VI to be obserued in the Kynges Eschequier by the officers and clerkes of the same for takynge of fees of the Kynges accomptis in the same court
titleStmt.author: England.
England. Exchequer.
